## Summary

Describe what changed and why.

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactor/internal

## Validation

- [ ] `cargo fmt --all`
- [ ] `cargo clippy --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings`
- [ ] `cargo test --all-targets --all-features`

## Performance evidence (if applicable)

- [ ] Attached benchmark before/after data
- [ ] No unverifiable performance claims

## Behavioral impact

- [ ] No CLI/output contract change
- [ ] CLI/output change documented in README and release notes

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests added/updated
- [ ] Docs updated (README/CONTRIBUTING/release notes)
- [ ] Linked related issue(s)
